    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    add_book_service
    Service class responsible for adding new books to the library system.
    Admin
    Represents an administrator in the library system.
    AdminData
    Provides static data for Admin users in the system.
    Book
    Represents a book in the library system.
    BookData
    Provides static data for books in the library system.
    BookFileManager
    Provides file-based data management for storing and loading books.
    BookSearchService
    Provides services to search for books in the library.
    BorrowCDService
    Service class responsible for managing CD borrowing and returning operations within the library system.
    BorrowService
    Service class to manage borrowing and returning of books in the library.
    CD
    Represents a CD in the library system.
    CDData
    Acts as an in-memory CD database.
    CDFileManager
    Provides file-based storage and loading functionality for CD objects.
    CDLoan
    Represents a loan of a CD to a library user.
    CDService
    Service class to manage CD borrowing, returning, and overdue fines.
    EmailConfig
     
    EmailService
    Email service used for sending real emails (SMTP) and for mocking in unit tests.
    EmailService.EmailSender
    Email sender interface for real + mock.
    EmailService.MockEmailSender
    MOCK sender (for unit tests only)
    EmailService.SmtpEmailSender
    REAL SMTP sender (Gmail)
    Fine
    Represents a fine imposed on a library user.
    FineData
    Provides static data management for fines in the library system.
    FineService
    Service class to manage fines for users in the library system.
    Loan
    Represents a loan of either a Book or a CD to a library user.
    LoanData
    Provides static data management for loans in the library system.
    LogFileManager
    Handles writing log messages to a text file for the library system.
    login_logout_service
    Service class responsible for handling administrator login and logout operations.
    MediaReportService
    Service class to generate reports on borrowed media and fines for users.
    NotificationService
     
    User
    Represents a library user.
    UserData
    Provides static data management for users in the library system.
    UserFileManager
    Handles saving user information into a text file.
    UserService
    Service class responsible for managing user-related operations, such as unregistering users and checking their eligibility.
